page.title: 19St.John's Primary School
page.content: St/ John's,Wetley Rocks stands next to St.John the Baptist Church. The original building, made of stone,was erected 140yrs ago. Over the years buildings have been added.There are two areas of tarmac and a small grasses area for playing. Education is provided for children aged 5 to 11yrs.There are at present 148 children on roll but as many as 250 children attended in 1978.Subjects taken are Maths, English,Science, R.E., History, Geography, Art & Craft,Music, and Games. The top class go swimming once a week. In 1984 it was proposed that the school should be closed and the pupils sent to other schools but after great pressure from parents it was decided that the school should remain open.
